text: Barang Junction railway station is a railway station on the East Coast Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Barang town. Its code is BRAG. It has four platforms. Passenger, MEMU, Express trains halt at Barang Junction railway station. ==Major Trains== * East Coast Express * Sri Jagannath Express ==See also== * Cuttack district ==References== Category:Railway stations in Cuttack district Category:Khurda Road railway division
title: Barang Junction railway station
